reasoning: Both screenshots show a visible error dialog with the message 'Another user has taken action on the page and its state has been changed.' The test report confirms the API endpoint /API/EvoqContentLibrary/Publishing/PublishTab returns 500 server errors consistently, even after refreshing as instructed by the error dialog.
evidence_summary: Screenshot 1 shows an error modal appearing when clicking Publish, with page content marked for approval workflow. Screenshot 2 shows the same error persisting after page refresh, with '[DRAFT TEST]' content visible. The edit bar with Discard and Publish buttons is present in both, confirming the workflow UI exists but the publish action fails with server errors.
